data: Improving the Teaching & Learning of French in our school

The project ‘The Teaching and Learning of the French Language and Culture’, a week’s course in France involves daily sessions on creative teaching methods in languages, the integration of ICT in language teaching and a visit to a French school.  Two French language teachers will attend the course and will participate in all teaching sessions and cultural and educational visits.  There will be good opportunities to network and exchange teaching ideas with the other European teachers attending the course and the French teachers at the school.  At the end of the week, the teachers will produce some teaching materials for presentation.  After the course, the teachers will continue to exchange ideas with the other teachers through a blog.   As a result of the attendance of the week’s course, the school and its pupils will benefit from a more innovative language curriculum through the introduction of the creative teaching methods learnt on the course and there will be opportunities to develop European projects through the links made on the course.
